forge.ethyr.torch.save module¶

class forge.ethyr.torch.save.Resetter(resetTol)¶

Bases: object

Utility for model stalling that keeps track of the time since the model has improved

Parameters

resetTol – ticks before resetting

step(best=False)¶

Step the resetter

Parameters

best (bool) – whether this is the best model performance thus far

Returns

whether the model should be reset to

the previous best checkpoint

Return type

bool

class forge.ethyr.torch.save.Saver(root, savef, bestf, resetTol)¶

Bases: object

Model save/load class

Parameters

  • root – Path for save

  • savef – Name of the save file

  • bestf – Name of the best checkpoint file

  • resetTol – How often to reset if training stalls

checkpoint(params, opt, reward)¶

Save the model to file

Parameters

  • params – Parameters to save

  • opt – Optimizer to save

  • fname – File to save to

load(opt, param, best=False)¶

Load the model from file

Parameters

  • opt – Optimizer to load

  • params – Parameters to load

  • best – Whether to load the best or latest checkpoint

Returns

The epoch of the loaded checkpoint

Return type

epoch

print()¶

Print stats for the latest epoch
